Description:
You find a pedestal with a strange orb on top that is anchored to the pedestal. Next to the pedestal you see a stone tablet that explains how it works: it seems to be an orb of corruption and to unanchor it you have to recharge it completely by placing your hand on the glyphed tile atop the pedestal, which will drain the life force of that person until the orb is fully recharged.

You recall that you can imbue the Whispering Stone with an orb of corruption.
DescriptionAction: Will you do so, even though it means sacrificing your life force?

When you vision recovers you see that the Whispering Stone seems to be casting shadows in multiple directions! How bizarre...",
